name: N-Gage Game File
summary: Learn about .NGAGE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Nokia phones that support the N-Gage application include the N73, N78, N81, N82, N93, N95, N96, and the Nokia XpressMusic 5320.

description: Video game written for the Nokia's N-Gage mobile gaming platform; can be played on an N-Gage phone or a Nokia smartphone that supports the N-Gage 2.0 service; requires the N-Gage application to be installed on the phone in order to run.
